e`r fontawesome::fa("r-project")`g was founded in 2022 by John Kulas (aka "John-o"), an Industrial and Organizational Psychologist. The focus of the consultancy is on Statistical and Psychometric applications. The mission of e`r fontawesome::fa("r-project")`g includes a continuation of collaboration and mentorship for graduate students in Industrial and Organizational Psychology, and these students contribute to e`r fontawesome::fa("r-project")`g via contract assignments. Dr. Kulas' [resume can be accessed here](Kulas vita.pdf).
